thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com | 5 of 135
thread.title: Candace
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Candace

author: Candace
title: Candace
text: I work at a high end furniture store downtown Dallas, but Home Zone allowed me to choose fabrics at a lower cost. The first sales person i met was Keith. He was great. He gave me room to breath while shopping, but wasn't too far to answer all of my questions. He even held a conversation that made me feel right at home. The entire staff have great customer service! Everytime I walked in everyone was there to help.
